name: Infected / Zombies (Omegga)
description: Round-based Infected (Zombies) gamemode with auto-bind, preset import (from /data), robust creation, mid-round join to Infected, team tint, optional sounds, and persistent stats.
author: chatgpt-assistant

authorized-users.description: Admins allowed to run admin-only commands

minigame-name.description: Name of the minigame/preset to create/bind/load

survivor-weapon.description: Item/weapon name given to survivors (leave blank to no-op)

infected-knife.description: Melee item given to infected (leave blank to no-op)

bonus-weapon.description: Temporary bonus for the first infected until first survivor death (leave blank to no-op)

team-color-enabled.description: Put zombies on a green-tinted team (best-effort)

enable-sounds.description: Play local sounds on role changes (best-effort)

sound-become-zombie.description: Sound to play when becoming a zombie (asset path, blank=no-op)

sound-spawn-survivor.description: Sound to play when spawning as a survivor (asset path, blank=no-op)

sound-spawn-infected.description: Sound to play when spawning as an infected (asset path, blank=no-op)

timer-visible.description: Print round timer updates to players

start-on-create.description: Start a round immediately after !infected createminigame

enable-kill-tracking.description: Enable best-effort kill tracking (off by default)

mid-join-assign-infected.description: When enabled, players who join mid-round are auto-assigned to Infected.

preset-import-enabled.description: If enabled, plugin copies /data Infected.bp into the server's Minigame Presets folder and loads it.

preset-source.description: Path under the plugin folder to the preset .bp file to import

preset-target-dir.description: Absolute path to the server's Minigame Presets folder (must be set)

commands.name: !infected createminigame
commands.description: Create/setup or import+load and bind to the configured minigame (admin-only).

commands.name: !infected importpreset
commands.description: Copy the preset from /data to the server presets folder and LoadPreset (admin-only).

commands.name: !infected bindminigame <index>
commands.description: Bind the plugin to an existing minigame index (admin-only).

commands.name: !infected bindminigame name <PresetName>
commands.description: Bind the plugin to an existing minigame by name (admin-only).

commands.name: !infected debuglist
commands.description: Dump raw outputs of minigame list calls to console for debugging.

commands.name: !infected status
commands.description: Show round state, counts, timer, and bound minigame.
